Name: Final Attack: Dual Bowguns
Desc:
Attack skills have a chance of inflicting additional damage. Must have a Dual Bowgun equipped.
Required Skill: Dual Bowgun Mastery Lv. 3 or above
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 4th Job Skill, 'Advanced Final Attack'

H.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] With 40% chance, invoke 75% final attck 2 times.
H.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] A 40% chance of Final Attack that attacks at 75% Damage 2 times

h1.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] With 40% chance, invoke 75% final attck 2 times.
h1.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] A 40% chance of Final Attack that attacks at 75% Damage 2 times

HFields.h1: [Final Attack Type Skill] A 40% chance of Final Attack that attacks at 75% Damage 2 times
